item.title: Simple basic quest!
item.dc:creator: @armadyl_slayer armadyl slayer
item.description:
@armadyl_slayer wrote:

ok so lots want quests in my other query i made the quest guide this is how you do it…

playerHasItem (book id, 1) && playerHasItem (itemid, 1)
addSkillXP 10000, 1;
addItem (rewardid, amount)

thats the end of quest

making quest

quest 1 {

       wolf bone // title
sendQuest(128) a wolf's gone missing! 6533;
sendQuest(128) 6534;
sendQuest(128) all thats left behind is bones! 6535;
sendQuest(128) 6536;
sendQuest(128) investigate the scene for clues on the murderer 6537;
sendQuest(128) 6538;
sendQuest(128) then report to hans! 6539;
sendQuest(128) 6540;

quest 1;
wolf bone;
step1;
investigate;
item (bones)
item (itemID)
talkToNPC 0;
NPCDialouge (0)
(""have you found evedence?"");
interfaceID (444 444);
yes;
openInterface (445 445);
} else {
NPCDialouge (0)
(""come back when you have"");
closeInterface (444 444);
} else {
NPCDialouge (0)
(""show me the evidence pleaese"");
playerHasItem (boneID)
DeleteItem (boneID)
} else {
NPCDialouge (0)
(""get the evidence then come back"");

this is only part of the quest stuff on my source…

NOTE: this may not work for your server…depending on the source
